name: Dementor and the hopelessness
description:
Dementors drain peace, hope, and happiness out. We will lose every good feeling, every happy memory.

When they attack Hogwarts it make everyone are scared. But this picture didn't mean fear and hopeless but this is the beginning of brave. Magical students against dementors with no fear.

“I learned that courage was not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it. The brave man is not he who does not feel afraid, but he who conquers that fear.” - NELSON MANDELA
